name: Heatran
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

poke_power.name: Flash Fire
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {R} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can’t be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Magma Storm
attacks.effect: You may discard as many basic Energy cards as you like attached to Heatran. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.
